name: Gloomseer
summary: Gloom holds few terrors for you, and the pall of darkness over Nidal has made you comfortable in dim light.
description:
Gloom holds few terrors for you, and the pall of darkness over Nidal has made you comfortable in dim light. You gain low-light vision.Gloomseer Leads To...

DarkseerTraitsHuman: A creature with this trait is a member of the human ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.
